name: Overheard
description:
(When playing in browser, please click fullscreen!)

For most, commuting is a strange experience integral to surviving in a city. Sometimes, eavesdropping on your fellow commuters provides the entertainment or food for thought needed to make the journey pass quicker. Overheard lets you lean in and listen on your commute in London.  

A short prototype I created in unity for my Code Coven Intro to Gamemaking Course (2023). I'm hoping to build on this project, in time. 

https://ko-fi.com/halomedes
